short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the Raiz Rewards browser extension to receive reminders of the great rewards you can earn when shopping with Raiz Rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install the Raiz Rewards browser extension to receive reminders of the great rewards you can earn when shopping with Raiz Rewards.

The Raiz Rewards browser extension will automatically notify you of our partners so you can earn cash rewards invested back into your active Raiz Invest account or your Raiz Invest Super account. Don’t miss out on rewards from hundreds of stores so you can save and invest small amounts regularly.

The extension will appear on a search results page for stores that are partnered with Raiz Rewards, showing the reward amount you can earn with them. When you visit the partner’s site, you will be prompted to activate the rewards by logging in to your Raiz account. Then, click the partner’s "Activate Raiz Rewards" button and start shopping when you see the message "Raiz is tracking."

Never miss out on rewards again! Download the extension now and start saving and investing when you shop with Raiz Rewards.


The Raiz app is operated and promoted by Raiz Invest Australia Limited (ACN 604 402 815) – Authorised Representative of Instreet Investment Limited (ACN 128 813 016 AFSL 434776). Product Disclosure Statements (PDS) and Target Market Determinations (TMD) for these products are available on the Raiz Invest website and App. A person should read and consider the PDS and TMD before deciding whether, or not, to acquire and continue to hold interests in these products. The risks of investing in these products are fully set out in the PDS and include the risks that would ordinarily apply to investing.
